summary: Two schoolteachers take their rivalry to a new level, while they scramble to win a holiday baking contest and the affections of a handsome single father.
cast: Erin Krakow|David Haydn-Jones|Miranda Frigon|Laura Soltis|Jill Morrison|Genea Charpentier|Alan Thicke|Alexandra Staseson|Jason Hunt|Emily Delahunty|Sabina Nelson|Gracyn Shinyei|Jaeda Lily Miller|Isabella Piombini
title: Mi dulce Navidad
